name: Super Kaiju Chase
description:
When the city detects that a kaiju is approaching, everyone is evacuated - except for one little kid who accidentally sleeps through it all. After realizing that everyone is gone the kid tries to make friends with the city's new visitor.

Super Kaiju Chase is an asynchronous two-player game. The Kid speeds, drifts, and jumps around the city on a tricycle, while Kaiju sneaks and slides behind the cover of buildings.

 

(This development build of Super Kaiju Chase relies on split screen for two-player support, but a networked multiplayer option is in progress.)

Super Kaiju Chase was created by:
  • Concept & Code by @Soggymender
  • Character Design & Modeling by Callan @fznmeatpopsicle
  • Environment & Title by @JoshuaZuluaga
  • Rigging by Connor Kurtz
  • Animation by Aaron Vaughn
  • Composed and Recorded by Darryl Clayton (@DarrylClayton) and Produced by Robert Bales
  • Technical and creative Audio Design by Robert Bales @rbalessounddesign
  • Network Programming by Ice9
